ModMetadata.Name: Cardboard Box Tooltips
ModMetadata.Author: lorexcold
ModMetadata.Description: [h1]Cardboard Box Tooltips[/h1] [b]WARNING:[/b] This is a Stationeers Launchpad Plugin Mod. It requires BepInEx to be installed with the Stationeers Launchpad plugin. Installation Guide: [url=https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad?tab=readme-ov-file#fresh[/url] Cardboard Box Tooltips adds hover tooltips to cardboard boxes, displaying their contents directly in the extended item text for easy inventory management without opening the box. [h2]Features[/h2] [list] []Extended Tooltips: Hover over a cardboard box to see a list of its contents, including item names and quantities for stackable items. []Empty Box Handling: Clearly indicates if the box is empty or has no storage slots. []Limit Protection: Displays up to 20 items (incase a mod comes out that increases slots.) [/list] [h2]Notes[/h2> [list] []Tooltips only appear for cardboard boxes and integrate seamlessly with the existing item inspection UI. []Compatible with mods that expand box storage slots. [*]Dedicated Server Compatible. [/list] [h2]Requirements[/h2] [list] [*]StationeersLaunchPad with BepInEx installed. [/list]
ModMetadata.ChangeLog: [h3]Version 1.0.0:[/h3] [list] [*]Initial release: Added tooltip support for cardboard box contents. [/list]
